description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into mud/swamp at will, making the user a Swamp Human. The user can create bottomless swamps and store objects and people within their body.

users.circumstances: Caribou had already consumed the fruit before this episode; this is the first time it is shown in the anime

abilityReveals.description: User can transform into swamp/mud, allowing attacks to pass through them harmlessly. Demonstrated when Caribou absorbs a cannonball into his body.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caribou demonstrates his Logia powers while attacking the Fake Straw Hats, absorbing attacks into his swamp body.

abilityReveals.description: User can store objects and people within their swamp body, functioning as bottomless storage space.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caribou uses this ability during his attack on the Fake Straw Hats.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim and weakness to seawater
Cannot return to human form if trapped somewhere their normal body cannot fit

strengths.strength: Logia intangibility allows user to avoid most physical attacks
strengths.description: As a Logia-type, the user can become intangible and avoid conventional attacks.

strengths.strength: Bottomless swamp creation can trap enemies
strengths.description: User can create swamps that are impossible to escape from; victims sink deeper if they struggle.
